content: A company's IT department created a system that controls user access and authentication to ensure data security. What is the name of this system?

The system created by a company's IT department to control user access and authentication for ensuring data security is commonly known as an "Identity and Access Management" (IAM) system. IAM systems help in managing users' identities and their access to various resources within an organization, ensuring that the right individuals have access to the right resources at the right times for the right reasons.
